LanguageData.Pa_Wombat.label: 120mm Wombat Recoiless Anti-Tank Gun
LanguageData.Pa_Wombat.description: Wombat attached to a towable platform.
LanguageData.Turret_Wombat.label: 120mm Wombat RATG
LanguageData.Turret_Wombat.description: 120mm Wombat Recoiless Anti-Tank Gun, a slightly more maneuverable, smaller, lighter, powerful as a 120mm AT gun but it offers lot less range than a full size AT gun.
